value: to the tune of young-at-heart
I've rewritten the words and I'm gonna
sing it faster otherwise it's boring
your nightmares can come true it could
happen to you if you offend the NARC
then our skin is so thin disagreements
us in if you offend the NARC they
project and deflect but they won't self
reflect cuz that offends the NARC never
laugh at their gaffes or they'll crawl
up your ass because that offends the
NARC they'll bring trouble and strife
for the rest of your life if you offend
the nah
nostrils flare wild hair and their fangs
they will bear if you offend the NARC
but here is the worst part they'll hunt
you like a shark
if you even accidentally offend the NARC
[Music]
dedicated to all my friends and aimed
right square in the jaw of all the narcs
and sociopaths and cluster b haters out
there
